solution_line_template: Since {total_percentage} percent represent the original price, and she received a {discount_percentage}% discount which is ${discount_amount}, the original price is {total_percentage}/{discount_percentage}*{discount_amount} = <<{total_percentage}/{discount_percentage}*{discount_amount}={original_price}>>{original_price}
Maria paid ${original_price}-${discount_amount} = $<<{original_price}-{discount_amount}={amount_paid}>>{amount_paid} after receiving the twenty-five percent discount.
